title: Bandelier National Monument: Boating in Bandelier
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Outdoor Activities     Boating in Bandelier                Boating in Bandelier       Regarding boating in White Rock Canyon, the boating community is advised that the eastern slope of Frijoles Canyon became unstable during successive flash floods in Summer 2011. A segment of the Falls Trail collapsed in this area of geologic hazard, and cannot be repaired. Boaters will no longer be able to hike out of the Rio Grande via Frijoles Canyon. The nearest alternative that we can offer is to hike out on the Burro Trail, accessed at the mouth of Alamo Canyon. The map below describes this alternate route.
